courts.name: Reading County Court and Family Court

opening_times.hours: By prior appointment only for urgent Civil and Family Applications

facilities.description: Ten interview rooms are available at this court.
facilities.name: Interview room

facilities.description: This building has a ramp to the building entrance, a lift between the ground floor and the first floor, and level access in to court rooms and hearing rooms.
facilities.name: Disabled access

facilities.description: The building has hearing enhancement facilities available by prior arrangement.  Please contact the Court office by telephone or email if necessary.
facilities.name: Loop Hearing

facilities.description: No parking facilities are available. The court is in the town centre near the train and bus stations.
facilities.name: No parking

facilities.description: Baby changing facilities are available in the disabled toilets on the fourth floor
facilities.name: Baby changing facility

facilities.description:
Court/hearing room video conferencing facilities are available (by prior arrangement).

Virtual visits may be accommodated by prior arrangement. Client consultation is only available for hearings due to take place at Reading, during the course of the hearing.
facilities.name: Video facilities

facilities.description: This Court has a childrens room facility.
facilities.name: Children's waiting room

addresses.type: Visit us or write to us

courts.name: High Wycombe County Court and Family Court
Watford County Court and Family Court
